==Translingual==
{{stroke order|strokes=6}}

===Etymology===
{{liushu|p}}. [[虍]] represents the tiger's head. The torso has disappeared and the legs and the tail have transformed into [[人]] in the small seal script and later [[儿]] in the clerical script.

[[File:Oracle hu3 tiger.svg|50px]]
[[Image:Panthera tigris tigris.jpg|thumb|A tiger.]]
